description.en:
Auxilium is based on the Ethereum code-base and is the first such currency to have launched with PoA (Proof of Authority) and the unique AID (Auxilium Interest Distribution) platform, rather than PoW or PoS.

 

We decided that as we’re all about conservation, we’d need to write a PoA implementation with AID platform into our code-base to back up our environmental and philanthropical position and standing.

 

As is the case with Ethereum, we have smart contracts, tokens and the ability for a developer to write dapps for use on the Auxilium blockchain.

status_updates.description:
There is a time for everything.

Auxilium Global is closing its doors.

Please take time to read this last announcement.

https://auxiliumglobal.medium.com/auxilium-global-closing-its-doors-9a6e191b8e8

The reason why the network, etc. issue is not solved yet is the old bottleneck. Making the case for a swap stronger each day.However, we need the old dev to solve the issue before we can move on. Nothing I (Anton) can do at the moment. New dev is on stand-by to build asap.

The Auxilium wallet is temporarily offline.
Your coins are safe on the blockchain.

Contacted the developer to look into it asap. 

Informing you once everything is working again.

You spoke. The results are in.

A swap is in sight. ✨

A new era is coming for Auxilium! 🌑🌘🌗🌕

Buy Wrapped AUX on Pancakeswap and swap to AUX later! Contract: 0xb7B25baE2eeef9B1730C7F43a112294033C5FE2f

https://auxiliumglobal.medium.com/results-questionnaire-and-next-step-fc055fa33396

A reminder to fill out the form! 👍🏻

https://forms.gle/bfz61SeHf81cT8i69

The form results are used seriously in an attempt to become more community driven, and start a new era that fits most of community needs and wishes!

First week of February the results and decisions will be published as will a final form.

Hi people of the crypto space! 👋

Auxilium blockchain is looking to start a new era.

Input from AUX holders (and other interested) is very much appreciated.

Please fill out the form before 1st Feb 2022.
https://forms.gle/bfz61SeHf81cT8i69

Thanks! ✨

Started refunding fundraiser contributions to community members as we are heading a different direction. Fair's fair.

Auxilium #crypto is preparing for a new era in our #blockchain adventure.

Wishing everyone wonderful holidays! ✨
